row.process:
:SET &variableName# = "PCK.AUTOMIC_JDBC.PRV.PRV.VARA.TEMP.PP_EXECUTE_SQL_STATEMENT_RESULT.&$ACTIVATOR_RUNID#.&$PHYS_DATE_YYYYMMDD#" :SET &variablePath# = "" :SET &variableLine# = "" :SET &key# = "" :SET &NO_RECORD_AFFECTED# = "" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CREATE_PASS_VALUES_VARIABLE :SET &row_count# = 0 :SET &row_hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*Affected Rows: *") :PROCESS &row_hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&row_hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &posCount# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Affected Rows: ") : IF &posCount# > 0 : D &ARR#, string, 2 : FILL &ARR#[] = STR_SPLIT(&line#,"Affected Rows: ") : IF &ARR#[2] <> "" : SET &row_count# = STR_TRIM(&ARR#[2]) : PSET &UC4RB_OUT_COUNT_ROWS# = &row_count# : PRINT "Data rows in Resultset: &row_count#" : ENDIF
: IF &ARR#[2] <> "0" : SET &NO_RECORD_AFFECTED# = "FALSE" : ENDIF
: ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &row_hnd#
:SET &parseMode# = 0
:SET &lastKey# = "" :SET &lastContent# = "" :IF &NO_RECORD_AFFECTED# = "FALSE" : IF &ret# <> 0 : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE = &ret# : ELSE : SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*") : SET &COUNT# = 1 : SET &oldline# = "" : SET &NL#=UC_CRLF() : PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#)
: SET &posStart# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Processing Resultset ...") : SET &posEnd# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Affected Rows: ")
: IF &posEnd# > 0 ! end parsing the report if "Affected Rows: " is found ! We have to put the last line to the temporary variable : IF &lastKey# <> "" : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&lastKey#", "&lastContent#" : ENDIF : SET &parseMode# = "0" : ELSE : IF &posStart# > 0 ! start parsing the report if "Processing Resultset ..." is found : SET &parseMode# = "1" : ELSE : IF &parseMode# = "1" : SET &variableLine# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &COUNT# = FORMAT(&COUNT#) : SET &newLineFound# = STR_FIND(&variableLine#, "INFO - &COUNT#&UC4RB_DB_SQL_SEPARATOR#") : IF &newLineFound# > 0 ! ! We found a new line! We have to put the previous lines to the temporary variable. ! Then we create a new key. ! ! Do not put it to the Variable in the first run, ! as lastKey and lastContent will be empty. : IF &COUNT# > 1 : PUT_VAR &variableName#, "&lastKey#", "&lastContent#" : ENDIF
: SET &posLineNr# = STR_FIND(&variableLine#, &UC4RB_DB_SQL_SEPARATOR#) : SET &posLineNrLength# = SUB(&posLineNr#, 1) : SET &key# = MID(&variableLine#, 1, &posLineNrLength#) : SET &posLineNrLength# = STR_LENGTH(&UC4RB_DB_SQL_SEPARATOR#) : SET &posLineNr# = ADD(&posLineNr#, &posLineNrLength#) : SET &variableLine# = STR_CUT(&variableLine#, &posLineNr#)
: SET &lastkey# = &key# : SET &lastContent# = &variableLine#
: SET &COUNT# = &COUNT# + 1 : ELSE ! ! We did not find a new line. ! We are adding the line to the existing content. ! : SET &lastContent# = STR_CAT(&lastContent#, &NL#) : SET &lastContent# = STR_CAT(&lastContent#, &variableLine#) : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd# : ENDIF :ENDIF :PSET &UC4RB_OUT_SQL_QUERY# = "&variableName#"
